channel.description: 5.0 Security Fundamentals 5.7 Configure Layer 2 security features (DHCP snooping, dynamic ARP inspection, and port security) DHCP Snooping notices DHCP messages that fall outside the normal use of DHCP watches the DHCP messages that flow through a LAN switch builds a table that lists the details of legitimate DHCP flows other switch features can know what legitimate DHCP leases exist for devices connected to the switch.
